transcript: discipline has a lot to do with success and it also has nothing to do with success because you need to use discipline to set up your environment such that you no longer need to use discipline in order to continue doing things if you want to lose weight it's not about walking through a candy store every day and saying no it's about having all the food that you need ahead of time so that you don't need to make the decision when it gets hard and so it's like being an alcoholic don't go to bars same idea but like you can apply that to anything that you're trying to change we just want to create that environment deliberately so that we let it happen by accident from that going forward
